name: Selfie expert– Selfie, Beauty camera, photo editor
name_original: Selfie expert– Selfie, Beauty camera, photo editor
description:
Selfie expert the best selfie android app to refine your stylish selfie with selfie filters. Take your sweet selfie and apply selfie filters to win the selfie contest. Android selfie app is one of the easiest and simplest ways of taking awesome selfie. Selfie expert HD camera allows you number of beautiful selfie filters for you to refine your beautiful selfie with photo editor.

How Selfie expert HD camera works: 

• Use selfie camera to take selfie with beautiful candy camera
• Apply trendy selfie filters to your beautiful selfie and then upload it to the selfie 
contest to contest for winning the award of best selfie
• Apply selfie decorate your selfie to make it more beautiful

Selfie expert HD Camera features: 

• Easy user interface catchy colors
• 50 plus beautiful selfie filters
• Increase of light for each selfie filter
• Captures selfie of your best pose and best angle
• Photos with mosaic to pixilated photo background 
• Photo editor to crop and face detection
• Selfie contest to share your selfies with the online community to win the contest
• Facility to user to apply effects on live selfie Camera (beauty camera)

Download selfie expert HD camera the best selfie camera and selfie app to show the world the best version of you. Use this photo editor app and take stunning and revamp selfies of yourself
